chapter.title: Deployment By Build
chapter.paragraph:
There is currently no ready to go deployment pipeline based on public artifact repositories or distributors. Therefore, the software needs to be build manually, which is described in the
contributing guidelines /net/splitcells/network/CONTRIBUTING .

chapter.title: OS State Interface And Its Library
chapter.paragraph:
OS state interface can be installed via the project's
setup instructions /net/splitcells/os/state/interface/manual/setup .
